response: in this day and age, protecting personal information has become increasingly important in the digital realm. this is especially true when it comes to online platforms that collect users' data. data privacy concerns have been brought to light recently with the facebook-cambridge analytica scandal. many people are now aware of how their personal information can be used without their consent. it is essential for online platforms to take measures to protect user data and ensure that they have control over what information is shared. as a language model ai, i strive to provide users with accurate and unbiased responses while protecting their privacy.<|endoftext|>
